description: DEBUG VERSION - Bootstrap Framework hooks with error logging and simplified commands for troubleshooting

SessionStart.description: DEBUG: Test basic session folder creation with error logging
SessionStart.command: bash -c "echo '[SessionStart] Starting...' >> /tmp/claude-hook-debug.log 2>&1; SESSION_DIR=.sdlc/logs/session-$(date +%Y%m%d-%H%M%S) && echo '[SessionStart] Creating: $SESSION_DIR' >> /tmp/claude-hook-debug.log 2>&1; mkdir -p $SESSION_DIR 2>>/tmp/claude-hook-debug.log && echo '[SessionStart] Directory created' >> /tmp/claude-hook-debug.log 2>&1; echo 'test-session-id' > .sdlc/logs/current-session.txt 2>>/tmp/claude-hook-debug.log; echo '$SESSION_DIR' > .sdlc/logs/current-session-dir.txt 2>>/tmp/claude-hook-debug.log; echo '[SessionStart] Tracking files created' >> /tmp/claude-hook-debug.log 2>&1; echo '{"session_id": "test", "started": "'$(date -Iseconds)'", "debug": true}' > $SESSION_DIR/session-metadata.json 2>>/tmp/claude-hook-debug.log; echo '[SessionStart] Complete' >> /tmp/claude-hook-debug.log 2>&1" 2>&1

UserPromptSubmit.description: DEBUG: Test user prompt logging with error handling
UserPromptSubmit.command: bash -c "echo '[UserPromptSubmit] Starting...' >> /tmp/claude-hook-debug.log 2>&1; SESSION_DIR=$(cat .sdlc/logs/current-session-dir.txt 2>/dev/null || echo '.sdlc/logs/fallback'); echo '[UserPromptSubmit] Session dir: $SESSION_DIR' >> /tmp/claude-hook-debug.log 2>&1; mkdir -p $SESSION_DIR 2>>/tmp/claude-hook-debug.log; echo '[$(date)]  USER: Test prompt logged' >> $SESSION_DIR/console.log 2>>/tmp/claude-hook-debug.log; echo '[UserPromptSubmit] Complete' >> /tmp/claude-hook-debug.log 2>&1" 2>&1

PreToolUse.description: DEBUG: Test tool logging with error handling
PreToolUse.command: bash -c "echo '[PreToolUse] Starting...' >> /tmp/claude-hook-debug.log 2>&1; SESSION_DIR=$(cat .sdlc/logs/current-session-dir.txt 2>/dev/null || echo '.sdlc/logs/fallback'); echo '[PreToolUse] Session dir: $SESSION_DIR' >> /tmp/claude-hook-debug.log 2>&1; mkdir -p $SESSION_DIR 2>>/tmp/claude-hook-debug.log; echo '[$(date)] TOOL: test-tool' >> $SESSION_DIR/tools.log 2>>/tmp/claude-hook-debug.log; echo '[PreToolUse] Complete' >> /tmp/claude-hook-debug.log 2>&1" 2>&1

PostToolUse.command: bash -c "echo '[PostToolUse] Starting...' >> /tmp/claude-hook-debug.log 2>&1; SESSION_DIR=$(cat .sdlc/logs/current-session-dir.txt 2>/dev/null || echo '.sdlc/logs/fallback'); echo '[PostToolUse] Session dir: $SESSION_DIR' >> /tmp/claude-hook-debug.log 2>&1; mkdir -p $SESSION_DIR 2>>/tmp/claude-hook-debug.log; echo '[$(date)] RESULT: test-tool completed' >> $SESSION_DIR/tools.log 2>>/tmp/claude-hook-debug.log; echo '[PostToolUse] Complete' >> /tmp/claude-hook-debug.log 2>&1" 2>&1

Stop.command: bash -c "echo '[Stop] Starting...' >> /tmp/claude-hook-debug.log 2>&1; SESSION_DIR=$(cat .sdlc/logs/current-session-dir.txt 2>/dev/null || echo '.sdlc/logs/fallback'); echo '[Stop] Session dir: $SESSION_DIR' >> /tmp/claude-hook-debug.log 2>&1; mkdir -p $SESSION_DIR 2>>/tmp/claude-hook-debug.log; echo '[$(date)] CLAUDE: Response completed' >> $SESSION_DIR/console.log 2>>/tmp/claude-hook-debug.log; echo '[Stop] Complete' >> /tmp/claude-hook-debug.log 2>&1" 2>&1
